name: Nyan Cat Google Bar [UPDATED]
description:
UPDATE~! Now properly formatted to fit Google+'s stylesheet updates.

Nyan Cat for the Google Bar on all Google services.
An improvement on LouCypher's http://www.userstyles.org/styles/51494/google-bar-nyan-cat, featuring a redesigned nyan cat design and improved font colors. :D
And unlike his version, this one actually works properly. 
Works great with displays up to 1500 pixels wide.
